awards.text: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 4 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Susan Traherne has been irreparably changed by her wartime experiences as a Resistance fighter. She sets out in the post-war world to make her way to what she wants, no matter who is hurt, or how.
plot: A young Englishwoman spends 20 years to make whatever kind of life for herself at the expense of others around her in post-World War 2 England.
title: Plenty
